Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • Job
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Job>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompoundJob

    public class Job
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Job>
    A class that contains information for a job.
    Author:
    Lilith Freed

      • Job

        public Job(int id,
           int earliestStart,
           int deadline,
           int duration,
           int profit)
        Initializes all fields of Job using input values.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the job.
        earliestStart - The earliest time the job may be started.
        deadline - The latest time that the job may be completed.
        duration - The length of time the job will take to complete.
        profit - The amount of profit that can be earned from completing the job.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Job j1)

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Job>
        Parameters:
        j1 - A Job object.
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer when this object's ID is less than, equal to, or greater than the ID of the param.
